General.Name: Xinjiang Tianye Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Tianye Co.,Ltd. produces and sells chemical products in China and internationally. The company's chemical products include caustic soda, polyvinyl chloride (PVC) resins, PVC paste resins, 1, 4-butanediol, and ethylene glycol. It also offers water-saving products, such as agriculture U-PVC pipes, drip tapes with side flipper, pressure compensating driplines, and PE hoses modified with nano material; and cement products comprising general Portland cement, special cement, calcium carbide residue cement, and silicate cement clinker. In addition, the company provides food products, including tomato paste; plastic products, such as polyethylene blow molding agricultural mulching films, PVC wood plastic building templates, unplasticized polyvinyl chloride plastic window, and unplasticized PVC -u profiles for doors and windows; and package products comprising cement bags, jumbo bags, and heavy packaging films. Further, it offers calcium carbide, and generates thermoelectricity. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Shihezi, China.
